title: Mace +1
content:
Mace +1 Uncommon 2~7 Damage 1d6+1Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The leather handle of this mace smells badly of rotting blood. Mace 1.8 40

1d6+1Bludgeoning

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The leather handle of this mace smells badly of rotting blood.

Mace +1 is one of the Simple Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dip
